item.description:
I hope everyone had a great New Years Eve. Let's start off the year with a walk through Bare Cove.

This is a great time to stroll through the snow covered paths and side trails. Bare Cove is a little tough to get to if you're not good with directions but feel free to call me if you get lost. My number is 508-510-1136.

Here is some info on the park: http://www.hingham-ma...

A map of Bare Cove: http://www.hingham-ma...

We'll meet in the parking area behind the bus depot. The entrance is across from the West Hingham commuter rail T stop, on the Greenbush line.

Excuse the last minute posting.
item.how_to_find_us: I'm a tall guy with short hair. I'll have a VW Jetta.
item.name: A Walk In The Snow
